product_name: Planet Bike Mini Versair Dual Action Pump
long_description: The Planet Bike Mini Versair Dual Action pump allows standard handheld pumping on poor ground conditions or upright pumping to maximize power. Dual-action pumping handles both high-volume mountain bike tires, and high-pressure road tires, even over 100 psi. T-shaped handle and ergonomic base lever offers comfort, stability and power. Aluminum inner barrel with see-through outer barrel provides super-smooth pumping. Extension hose eases pumping, and it neatly tucks away when not needed; twisting lock head adapts to fit Presta or Schrader valves. Includes mounting bracket with rip-and-stick strap. The Planet Bike Mini Versair is rebuildable.
short_description: The Planet Bike Mini Versair Dual Action pump allows standard handheld pumping on poor ground conditions or upright pumping to maximize power.
